author: ghugo83
body:
`getCopyNumber("EREG")` does not work in dd4hep case because of the trailing copy number in the **EREG** name.

No need to modify the bahavior of ECAL BaseNumber (which would also affect old DD / not work in case different hierarchy levels contain the same name).
Nor to play with string parsing.

Much simpler is to just restore access to EREG hierarchy level. Now that old ECAL algo is restored, the hierarchy levels are the same for old DD and DD4hep anyway.
title: Mini-PR: Fix Z side in Preshower
